enhanced_by.reason: The method 'emptyIfNull' ensures that the input iterable is not null, which is a prerequisite for the 'get' method to function correctly.
The method 'checkIndexBounds' validates the index to ensure it is within the valid range, which is necessary before attempting to retrieve an element.
The method 'first' retrieves the first element of the iterable, which is a special case of the 'get' method when the index is 0.
The method 'size' can be used to validate the size of the iterable before attempting to retrieve an element, ensuring that the index is within bounds.
